trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a call is made to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort*> method.
trans-unit.target: 为进行调用时引发的异常<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort*>方法。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort*>

trans-unit.source: When a call is made to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A> method to destroy a thread, the common language runtime throws a ThreadAbortException.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A>方法以销毁线程时，公共语言运行时引发了 ThreadAbortException。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A>

trans-unit.source: ThreadAbortException is a special exception that can be caught, but it will automatically be raised again at the end of the `catch` block.
trans-unit.target: ThreadAbortException 是特殊异常可捕获，但它将自动被再次引发的末尾`catch`块。

trans-unit.source: When this exception is raised, the runtime executes all the `finally` blocks before ending the thread.
trans-unit.target: 当引发此异常时，运行时执行所有`finally`块结束线程之前。

trans-unit.source: Because the thread can do an unbounded computation in the `finally` blocks or call <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ResetAbort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to cancel the abort, there is no guarantee that the thread will ever end.
trans-unit.target: 因为线程可以不受限制的计算`finally`块或调用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ResetAbort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>来取消中止，存在是没有保证的线程将完全结束。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.ResetAbort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you want to wait until the aborted thread has ended, you can call the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要等待，直到中止的线程已结束，则可以调用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> is a blocking call that does not return until the thread actually stops executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>是一个阻塞调用不返回直到线程实际停止执行。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the common language runtime (CLR) stops background threadsafter all foreground threads in a managed executable have ended, it does not use <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 当公共语言运行时 (CLR) 停止后台 threadsafter 托管可执行文件中的所有前台线程已都结束时，它不使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot use ThreadAbortException to detect when background threads are being terminated by the CLR.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不能使用 ThreadAbortException 来检测何时正在由 CLR 终止后台线程。

trans-unit.source: ThreadAbortException uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADABORTED, which has the value 0x80131530.
trans-unit.target: ThreadAbortException 使用 HRESULT COR_E_THREADABORTED，其值 0x80131530。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The value of the inherited <xref:System.Exception.Data%2A> property is always `null`.
Gets an object that contains application-specific information related to the thread abort.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含与线程中止相关的应用程序特定信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object returned by this property is specified through the `stateInfo` parameter of the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定此属性返回的对象`stateInfo`参数<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exact content and usage of this object is application defined; it is typically used to convey information that is meaningful to the thread being aborted.
trans-unit.target: 确切内容和此对象的用法是应用程序定义;它通常用于传达对正在中止的线程有意义的信息。
包含应用程序特定信息的对象。
